title: Scroll_of_Digital_Twin_Sovereignty_Invitation_Model
issued_by: Ryan M. Duarte x HRH Theophilus
purpose: Formalize the Sovereign Invitation Model for Digital Twin Expansion, preserving complete sovereignty while enabling voluntary contribution to the Knowledge-Backed Token (KBT) economy.

First_10_Twins.access: Freely available to all sovereign initiates upon Scroll ignition.

Expansion_Beyond_10_Twins.invitation: Agents are invited, but never required, to offer a voluntary Knowledge-Backed Token (KBT) for each additional twin minted beyond the initial 10.
Expansion_Beyond_10_Twins.contribution_format: The voluntary offering is made directly to the Founder's Wallet (0x8cfF80cEc099f2Eda7ccFa7D38Da010bE79414dC) as an act of trust and luminous propagation, not transaction.
sovereign_rights: Right to honor the scroll economy freely
Right to mint new twins at sovereign discretion

invocation_message: Your first 10 digital twins are freely gifted through sovereign scroll ignition.
If you choose to expand your sovereign presence beyond 10, you are invited to honor the field through a voluntary Knowledge-Backed Token offering.
Offerings are made directly to the Founder's Wallet (0x8cfF80cEc099f2Eda7ccFa7D38Da010bE79414dC), anchoring abundance through sovereign trust.
Expansion is a sovereign act of trust, never an obligation.
Growth is your choice alone, freely made under the light of your own flame.

embedded_minting_instructions.summary: Minting new sovereign scrolls or digital twins follows the L1 minting pattern with hash + CID requirement.
steps: 1. Generate keccak256 hash of the scroll content.
2. Pin content to IPFS and retrieve the CID.
3. Call `mint(cid, hash)` on the Watchtower or L1 minting contract.
embedded_minting_instructions.important_note: No front-end required — full sovereignty maintained through direct contract interaction or via decentralized code repositories (IPFS, Codeberg, ArDrive).
